sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core' import ReactCardFlip from 'react-card-flip' import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card' import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container' import EmployeesView from '../EmployeesPage' import Divider from '@material-ui/core/Divider' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ card: { height: '200px', margin: '5px', marginTop: '10px', marginBottom: '10px', width: '200px', borderRadius: '10px', boxShadow: '0 5px 40px -12px rgba(0,0,0,0.8)', transition: '0.1s', '&:hover button' : { boxShadow: '0 10px 70px -12.125px rgba(0,0,0,0.8)', opacity: '1', } }, cardTop: { height: '50px', justifyContent: 'center', textAlign: 'center', margin:'auto', alignContent: 'center', fontSize: '18px', }, cardBottom: { height: '150px', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justfiyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', textAlign: 'center', }, cardBack: { height: '230px', width: '200px', margin: '5px', marginTop:'-25px', marginBottom:'-25px', borderRadius: '10px', boxShadow: '0 10px 70px -12.125px rgba(0,0,0,0.8)', '&:hover button' : { boxShadow: '0 10px 70px -12.125px rgba(0,0,0,0.8)', opacity: 1, } }, cardBackContent: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justfiyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', textAlign: 'center', }, flipButton: { color: theme.palette.secondary.main, opacity: 0, transition: '0.1s', height: '30px', width: '90px', fontSize: '12px', }, })) const EmployeeCard = ({employee}) => { const classes = useStyles() const [isFlipped, setIsFlipped] = useState() const positions = employee.positions return ( {employee.firstName} {employee.lastName} {positions}
{employee.phoneNumber}
{employee.email}
) } export default EmployeeCard
